name: Hero's Edge
description:
Story

You and your friend Nessy had a very peaceful life at the lake, nice talks, longs "walks" and hiding from the paparazzis. Monsters don't have it easy and been captured was just a matter of time.

After several months in a small room a huge security failure becomes your only chance for freedom. You just want to come back home and not even the Lab Hero will stop you from getting Nessy and escaping.

Controls Supported

Keyboard and Mouse

  • Pause: Enter
  • Move:  WASD / ARROWS
  • Grab and Throw: TAB or  SPACE

Gamepad

  • Pause: Start 
  • Move: Left Stick
  • Grab and Throw:  Any Button except Triggers and LB

Gameplay

Escape the Lab!

You need to find the exit and eat all the enemies in the room to advance.  Eating them by jumping on them or grabbing them will give you lives.  

Win / Loose Conditions

  • Win: Escape.
  • Loose: Loose all your 5 lives.
